name: attendance-app-root
description: Root package for the attendance app

scripts.build:
echo 'Building simple Express server' && mkdir -p dist && echo 'const express = require("express"); const app = express(); const port = process.env.PORT || 3000; app.use(express.static("public")); app.get("/api", (req, res) => { res.json({message: "Hello from Attendance API!"}); }); app.listen(port, () => { console.log(`Server listening on port ${port}`); });' > dist/server.js && mkdir -p public && echo 'Attendance App

Attendance App

Deployed successfully!

' > public/index.html && npm install express
